install.name: System - SC jQuery
install.author: Phil Snell
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2009 Snellcode LLC. All rights reserved.
install.description: This plugin is used to load jQuery javascript library, and set "no conflict" mode to allow usage with mootools, and other libraries. No conflict mode remove the "$" operator from jQuery, allowing other libraries to use that operator. If you have questions, please email me at phil@snellcode.com

param.name: ui
param.label: Load jQuery UI libraies (all)
param.description: Loads all the jQuery UI libraries. Or replace the file with your personalized version

param.name: ui_theme
param.label: jQuery UI theme
param.description: Select a jQuery UI theme, or create your own at http://jqueryui.com/themeroller/

param.name: code
param.label: Enter custom code here
param.description: Any code here will be executed, and wrapped in to a protected 'document ready' function. No need to add your own 'document ready'. Ignored if empty.
